headline: MAA price target lowered to $158 from $165 at RBC Capital
summary: RBC Capital analyst Brad Heffern lowered the firm’s price target on MAA (MAA) to $158 from $165 and keeps a Sector Perform rating on the shares. The firm updated residential real estate investment trust estimates based on recent market rent trends, leasing updates, and higher costs of debt. Market rents generally came in below expectations in Q4, particularly in the Sun Belt, while the only post-quarter leasing update was also behind expectations, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
